# Preliminaries
## Importing Libraries and Data
```{r}
library(moderndive)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(gapminder)
```
## Importing Data
```{r}
evals_ch5<-evals%>%
  select(ID, score, bty_avg, age)
```

## Explore the Data
```{r}
glimpse(evals_ch5)
```

## Sample the Data
```{r}
evals_ch5 %>%
  sample_n(size = 5)
```

## Mean and Median of BTY and Score
```{r}
evals_ch5 %>%
  summarize(mean_bty_avg = mean(bty_avg), mean_score = mean(score),
            median_bty_avg = median(bty_avg), median_score = median(score))
```
## Five Number Summary
```{r}
evals_ch5 %>% select(score, bty_avg) %>% skim()
```
## Scatter
```{r}
plot(evals_ch5$score, evals_ch5$bty_avg)
```
## Correlation Between Score and BTY_Score
```{r}
evals_ch5%>%
  get_correlation(formula=score ~ bty_avg)
```
```{r}
evals_ch5 %>% 
  summarize(correlation = cor(score, bty_avg))
```
## Scatter Plot: Score Vs BTY_Score
```{r}
ggplot(evals_ch5, aes(x = bty_avg, y = score)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Beauty Score", 
       y = "Teaching Score",
       title = "Scatterplot of relationship of teaching and beauty scores")
```
## Scatter Plot with Jitter
```{r}
ggplot(evals_ch5, aes(x = bty_avg, y = score)) +
  geom_jitter() +
  labs(x = "Beauty Score", y = "Teaching Score",
       title = "Scatterplot of relationship of teaching and beauty scores")
```
## Regression Line on Plot
```{r}
ggplot(evals_ch5, aes(x = bty_avg, y = score)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Beauty Score", y = "Teaching Score",
       title = "Relationship between teaching and beauty scores") +  
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE)
```
## Linear Regression
```{r}
# Fit regression model:
score_model <- lm(score ~ bty_avg, data = evals_ch5)
# Get regression table:
get_regression_table(score_model)
```
## Fitting the Regression Model
```{r}
regression_points <- get_regression_points(score_model)
regression_points
```
